enb_long_title: UNFCCC WORKSHOPS ON CONVENTION ARTICLE 4.8 AND 4.9 (ADVERSE EFFECTS)
section_title: ADVERSE EFFECTS OF CLIMATE CHANGE ON FOOD SECURITY
sentences: On 9 March, Tom Downing made a presentation on food security.

Focusing on drought vulnerability and food security, drew attention to existing vulnerability assessment and adaptation efforts, and said climate diagnostics need to be integrated into responses at the local level.
